<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Download a backup"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/backups/{backupId}/download"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Download a completed backup as a zip archive. The backup must have a 'success' status.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier of the backup.","example":"ieidlxygmwj87oxz5hxttoc8","title":"BackupId"},"required":true,"name":"backupId","in":"path"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The backup file as a zip archive.","content":{"application/zip":{"schema":{}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized â€” the Bearer token is missing, invalid, or expired.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"}}}},"404":{"description":"Backup not found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"A machine-readable error code."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"A human-readable error message."}},"required":["code","message"],"title":"Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
